=C2=A0A dying tuner in box 86, th=
en I disconnected the original tuner and clip leaded in an Arm Band hack=C2=

 original tuner, the one that had the shortwave wave band, then I'll have t=
o remake the front panel too.=C2=A0 These things are often a crap shoot.

<div> A d=
ying tuner in box 86, then I disconnected the original tuner and clip leade=
d in an Arm Band hack radio to check the rest of the audio chain. So a=
fter that I took out the original tuner, the one that had the shortwave wav=
e band, then I'll have to remake the front panel too.  These things ar=
e often a crap shoot.</div>
  
<div> </div>
